citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 910am on 08-FEB-
21.
The inspector knocked on all doors, left a message at the contact phone number on file, and spoke to a neighbor and
employee of the adjacent business who both stated the licensee was gone for the day. The inspector waited 30 minutes
before departing the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 910am on 08-FEB-
21. 
The inspector knocked on all doors, left a message at the contact phone number on file, and spoke to a neighbor and 
employee of the adjacent business who both stated the licensee was gone for the day.  The inspector waited 30 minutes 
before departing the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
